alert.note: Alert for Simcoe Highlands (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 1:20PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of through 145 PM PDT... At 118 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southwestern Yakama Reservation, or 26 miles northwest of Goldendale. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwest Yakima County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
